title: "A Farm Of Robots: How Do We Define A Collection Of Modern, Smart Devices?"
excerpt: "However, when it comes to a collection of robots, we’re missing the mark, especially in the context of modern, smart robots. In the industry, the term in wide use is a fleet of robots. In fact, many robotics companies sell a companion “fleet manager” box to control their robots."
